title: Bingeworthy Watch: Inside Alexey Vermeulen’s ‘Phase II’ Gravel Development Project
content:
Vermeulen, a professional off-road cyclist, launched Phase II last year to give up-and-coming juniors a taste of the pro-level experience.

Read the full article at Bingeworthy Watch: Inside Alexey Vermeulen’s ‘Phase II’ Gravel Development Project on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
